title: mitigation
description: A function from an imported library.

name.description: The primary name for the ATT&CK mitigation.

desc.description: A description of the ATT&CK mitigation.

url.description: The URL that documents the ATT&CK mitigation.

tag.description: The synapse tag used to annotate nodes included in this ATT&CK mitigation.

references.description: An array of URLs that document the ATT&CK mitigation.

addresses.description: An array of ATT&CK technique IDs addressed by the mitigation.
